name: Lava Rises!
description:
You are a new employee working for a slightly shady company. Suddenly, you realize that lava is starting to seep in through the floor! Use the props around you to your advantage! Can you escape the lava in time?

This project is my submission for Weekly Game Jam Week 263

---------------------------------------------

Controls/What you need to know:

A and D keys to move.

Left-click to pick up props and Right-Click to place. You can only pick up and place props within the marked radius around your character.

SPACE to jump.

Get to the goal before the lava gets you. The goal might not be activated immediately; you have to wait for the timer to tick down before you can escape the level. In the meantime, survive the lava!
